title: unverified account pop up when i login on client
body:
i go to site ,and click resend verification email ,but i dont get the verification email on that address ,its not a different adress but i dont get the email and my account keeps saying its unverified

i dont receive email no matter how many 'resends' i press

replies.body: That's odd!  Double check your spam filter incase it may be going to the trash.  >.<  Are you certain the registered email is the address you're checking?  You should be able to see a hint of your address in your account management page.
